This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 7, 8 and 9

Try it out with
Also available,

Move, resize, and rotate your lockscreen clock easily, just like you would move a snapchat emoji!

Features:
- Saves current clock position
- Save up to three clock positions
- Fine tune positioning
- Auto-align
- Disable date subtitle
- Change clock color (new feature!)
- Toggle edit mode with a long press (new feature!)

Note: TimeMover partially conflicts with HotDog. If HotDog is installed, the clock will not be rotatable.

Configure options from Settings.

Video (iOS 10 demo):

This item is now Free. Completely fixed gesture recognizers 100% this time I promise <3 - Actually fixed the gesture recognizers >.>
- Added support for iOS 7
Fixed long-press edit mode and added switch
Fixed gestures to make them activate easier
Fixed bug that caused the date subtitle to remain visible when audio controls are present
